content: [Heidegger on modern forms of ontology vis phenomenology] only through phenomenology that ontology corresponding to it established on secure basis (sichere Problembasis): only in this manner that the consciousness-of-, the “of which (Wovon),” the object character of a being (der Gegenstandscharakter des Seienden) as such, becomes visible (sichtbar) > wide sense of phenomenology includes ontology > but, in such ontology, meaning of being (Seinssinn) never posed, unknown to it, genesis of meaning remains closed off to it > which field of Being is never asked

content: “Facticity (Faktizität),” designation (Bezeichnung) for the Seinscharakter of “our” “own” Dasein: “this” Dasein in its Jeweiligkeit, Verweilen [see TN endnote p. 102 for extensive explanation of neologism here], “its being-there for awhile at the particular time,” insofar as it is “there” in the manner of be-ing > Dasein is there for itself in the how (Wie) of its ownmost being (seines eigensten Seins) > “Being—transitive: to be factical life!” > Being not the possible object of a having (Habens) [dispossession]

content: [existential analytic defines the how of Dasein’s being] [re: temporality of today?] Dasein has its open space of publicness (Öffentlichkeit) and its ways of Seeing (seine Sicht) [there] [cf. 38 summary of today] > moves in definite mode of discourse (Redens) about itself: Gerede (talk) preserves Dasein in averageness > in talk lies guiding “as what” by which Dasein addresses “itself” > talk as the how in which Dasein’s having-been-interpreted (Ausgelegtheit) stands at its disposal > not externally applied to Dasein, something from out of which it lives, is lived, a how of is being

content: as open space of publicness, nothing eludes the talk: averageness (Durchschnittlichkeit), discusses everything w/ insensitivity to difference (Unterschiedsunempfindlichkeit) > Öffentlichkeit as being of “Man (every-one)”: everyone says that, everyone expects that, talk in circulation belongs to no one [Irigaray] > “Man” = “Niemand” > Dasein haunted like a specter by this circulation, a how of factical life that pays tribute to the fateful undoing (Verhängnisses) of facticity

content: [re: historical human sciences] [a pre-critique of Foucault?] each culture interrogated re: expressive being of its formation (Ausdruckseins ihrer Gebilde), on basis of its style, bringing into relief (Abhebung) the Gestaltcharaktere des Gestalthaften: morphology > one culture must be held up against another, method of universally comparing forms (Gestaltvergleichung) (homology, analogy, synchronism, parallelism) > “a closed form-endowed context (Zusammenhang) of forms”: totality of historical past explicated in such a way, a flattening down (Niederschlag) [translator frustratingly prefers word condensation here], can be mastered at a glance (in einem Blick), can order via charts/rubrics [classifying (Ordnung)]

content: [phenomenology beyond dialectic] dialectic directionless (richtungslos) when no Grundblick in direction of (auf) the subject matter (Sache), a rationality testing/proving itself by looking this way (i.e. not dialectically) [Heidegger uses rationality affirmatively here?] > all dialectic lives from table of others, Hegel: “this traditional material” (Plato, Aristotle) “extremely importance source, indeed a necessary condition [and] presupposition to be gratefully acknowledged” (Science of Logic) > dialectic is double-sidedly un-radical: 1) lives from hand to mouth 2) eloquent about readymade material

Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

content: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]
linkedContent: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]

content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]

linkedContent: attention (aufmerksam) should’ve been called to certain difficulty: many directions of philosophy today don’t provide much basis for phenomenological analysis Heidegger is initiating here

content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

content: categories are haphazardly employed (from disparate sources) to characterize the basis (Boden) from out of which classifying begins to run its course (seinen Gang nimmt) > “that the Ausgangsverhalten is unworried (Unbekümmertheit) [since worry is there in opening to phenomenological hermeneutics] about its own concrete and precise clarification when the classifying and filing away is being done” “is only a symptom of the fact that its objects are ‘only’ material for a typology and system of classification” > idea of knowledge pursued (angestrebte) here, already sketched out in advance (schon vorgezeichnet) [goes on to describe static system, structuralism even]

content: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal

content: developing (Ausbilden) of context of classificatory order is the leading self-conditioning mode of philosophy [the other 2: 1) the Ausgangsverhalten 2) accommodating multiplicity of types], analogous to holding-in-view of style in historical consciousness > this leading mode not a mere depicting, but a creative developing (schöpferisches Ausbilden) of the order itself: fashions (bildet) for/out of itself possibility of a universal process

content: relation of definitions of classificatory order: not one and then the other, but one is defined as that which belongs to the other [hetero-tautology], in itself it is the other as well, all others: (Welche Vorhabe? die des Wegsehens!) > the as-well-as (Sowohl-als auch), fundamental formal/categorial structure, limitlessness of its universality [bad infinity?]

content: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]

linkedContent: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]

content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present

content: epistemology still doesn’t understand that all theories of judgment are im Grunde theories of presentation (Vorstellungstheorie)
linkedContent: epistemology still doesn’t understand that all theories of judgment are im Grunde theories of presentation (Vorstellungstheorie)

content: [bracketing of phenomenology—deconstruction of Heidegger’s destruction?] Husserl’s phenomenology: “where are the objects about which logic speaks and how are they for it?” > Brentano characterized consciousness as intentionality, a concept that arose in Middle Ages, though it had narrower meaning then: volitional being-out-for-something and going-toward-it (das willentliche Aussein auf etwas) (orexis)
linkedContent: [bracketing of phenomenology—deconstruction of Heidegger’s destruction?] Husserl’s phenomenology: “where are the objects about which logic speaks and how are they for it?” > Brentano characterized consciousness as intentionality, a concept that arose in Middle Ages, though it had narrower meaning then: volitional being-out-for-something and going-toward-it (das willentliche Aussein auf etwas) (orexis)

content: Husserl’s object didn’t change, but the how of interrogating/defining it did, question of access (Zugangsfrage): a descriptive method (not a constructivist one) > “phenomenon” not primarily a category, but deals w/ how of access/grasping/safekeeping (Verwahrung), phenomenology (initially) nothing more than mode of research/inquiry (Weise der Forschung): “addressing (Ansprechen) something just as it shows (zeigt) itself and only to the extent that it shows itself”
linkedContent: Husserl’s object didn’t change, but the how of interrogating/defining it did, question of access (Zugangsfrage): a descriptive method (not a constructivist one) > “phenomenon” not primarily a category, but deals w/ how of access/grasping/safekeeping (Verwahrung), phenomenology (initially) nothing more than mode of research/inquiry (Weise der Forschung): “addressing (Ansprechen) something just as it shows (zeigt) itself and only to the extent that it shows itself”

content: [but] Husserl also held ideal of science, found it prescribed in mathematics: attempted to elevate description to mathematical rigor > mathematics is least rigorous of disciplines: easiest to gain access to [?]
linkedContent: [but] Husserl also held ideal of science, found it prescribed in mathematics: attempted to elevate description to mathematical rigor > mathematics is least rigorous of disciplines: easiest to gain access to [?]

content: to bring mathematics to play as model (Vorbildes) for all scientific disciplines is unphenomenological: meaning of rigor must be drawn from kind of object being questioned & mode of access appropriate to it (angemessenen Zugangsart) [Heidegger beyond Husserl]

content: Heidegger describes how transcendental idealism entered phenomenology [via Dilthey?] &, as a countermovement, traditional realism > no one asked whether epistemological questions are meaningless in phenomenology
linkedContent: Heidegger describes how transcendental idealism entered phenomenology [via Dilthey?] &, as a countermovement, traditional realism > no one asked whether epistemological questions are meaningless in phenomenology

content: [on the wishy-washy industry of phenomenology] George circle, Keyserling, anthroposophy, Stein, Phenomenology of Mysticism—“Beware of all this!” > “the ruin can no longer be halted!”
linkedContent: [on the wishy-washy industry of phenomenology] George circle, Keyserling, anthroposophy, Stein, Phenomenology of Mysticism—“Beware of all this!” > “the ruin can no longer be halted!”

content: phenomenology needs to be understood in accord w/ its possibility, possibility means: taking it up (ergreifen) in its being & developing (ausbilden) it (what’s sketched out in advance [vorgezeichnet] re: its possibilities)> in phenomenology, objects encountered by a definite manner of looking toward them and seeing them (bestimmtes Hinsehen), one does so already oriented toward them, an already-being-familiar (schon Bekanntsein), the sedimented result (Niederschlag) of having heard about them

content: [on destruction] fundamental historical critique > dismantling (Abbau) takes its departure from presentation of today’s situation > when tradition is critically dismantled, no longer get bogged down in seemingly important problems [arrival?]
linkedContent: [on destruction] fundamental historical critique > dismantling (Abbau) takes its departure from presentation of today’s situation > when tradition is critically dismantled, no longer get bogged down in seemingly important problems [arrival?]

content: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)

content: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]

content: free of standpoints only when there’s nothing to be done—but what if we have to look at things/research them? > free-standing detached standpoint = ruin of being-a-subject [is that now affirmative?] > developing our standpoint prior on the level of being > even unbiased seeing is a seeing, has a position in distinctive manner (appropriated so that it’s critically purged [kritischgereinigten]) > [so that an affirmative “freedom of standpoints” would be] an explicit (ausdrückliche) appropriation of our position of looking (Aneignung des Blickstandes), a position that is historical, not a chimerical in-itself outside of time

content: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]

content: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares
